SEARCH
Package game.interfaces

Interface IRoom

All Known Implementing Classes:
Room
public interface IRoom
Represents the interface for a room in the game.

  • Method Summary

    • hasPlayer

      boolean hasPlayer()
      Checks if the room contains a player.
      Returns:
      True if the room contains a player, false otherwise.

    • getPlayer

      Player getPlayer()
      Retrieves the player currently in the room.
      Returns:
      The player in the room.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If no player is present in the room.

      void removePlayer()
      Removes the player from the room.

      Places a player in the room.

      Marks the room as both an entrance and an exit.

    • isEntranceAndExit

      boolean isEntranceAndExit()
      Checks if the room is an entrance and an exit.
      Returns:
      True if the room is an entrance and an exit, false otherwise.
